:::Devil Gigatron:::

::at the old Keeper base, the spark of an ancient evil arrived::
???: Hmm, where can i find a body?
::He than sees the lifeless shell of Gigatron's old body and goes inside.  
The body mutates, and Devil Gigatron is born::
Devil Gigatron: YES! I LIVE AGAIN! I am Alpha and Omega, the beginning and 
the end!  And you will know my name is Gigatron when i lay my vengeance upon 
you!

--part1_bd.9b77d06.27658358_boundary
